column15: Marion Neumann@Washington University in St. Louis
column16: Jonathan Chen@Washington University in St. Louis
column17: Zac Christensen@Washington University in St. Louis

column1: EAAI Symposium Papers: Model AI Assignments

The Model AI Assignments session seeks to gather and disseminate the best assignment designs of the Artificial Intelligence (AI) Education community. Recognizing that assignments form the core of student learning experience
column2: we here present abstracts of ten AI assignments from the 2019 session that are easily adoptable
column4: and flexible for a variety of instructor needs. Assignment specifications and supporting resources may be found at http: //modelai.gettysburg.edu.
